ANN KILLION: The San Francisco 49ers saw starting QB Jimmy Garoppolo rally the offense in the second half, future QB Trey Lance race into the endzone, but it was the Packers’ Aaron Rodgers — a 49ers offseason trade target — who emerged victorious.

A ton of new housing is coming to Mid-Market. Will it turn around the neighborhood?

San Francisco’s Mid-Market is on the cusp of yet another transformation, as about 2,300 new housing units are opening or have opened recently. While creating a residential presence on Market Street has long been a goal of city planners, the opening of the new condos and apartment complex comes at a time when the neighborhood grapples with shuttered retail, empty office buildings and street crime.
He built a powerhouse. Ex-staffers say he sexually harassed employees along the way
